instructions: Open Pages, and if a document is already open, tap Documents or the Documents button in the top-left corner to see all your documents. Tap Select in the top-right corner, then tap the document (a checkmark appears). If you don t see the document you want to move, try searching for it, or tap Browse or Recents at the bottom of the screen. See Find a document . Tap the folder button at the bottom of the screen, then tap the folder or other location where you want to move the document. Tap Move in the top-right corner.

In the Music app, tap Library, then tap a category, such as Albums or Songs; tap Downloaded Music to view only music stored on iPhone. Tap an item, then tap Play, or tap Shuffle to shuffle an album or playlist. You can also touch and hold the album art, then tap Play.
Tap Library, then tap Playlists, Albums, Songs, TV & Movies, or Music Videos. Tap Sort, then choose a sorting method, such as title, artist, or recently added.
On your iPhone, go to Settings > Music, tap Sign In below Home Sharing, then sign in with your Apple ID. Open the Music app , go to Library > Home Sharing, then choose a shared library.

Launch the Phone application. Tap the Menu icon on the top right corner. Tap the Settings option from the menu. Older versions might say Call Settings instead of just Settings . Tap the Calls option from the menu. Tap the Call Forwarding option. You will be prompted to select one of the options below, select the desired option. Always forward: All calls are forwarded Forward when busy: Calls are forwarded only if you are currently on another call. Forward when unanswered: Calls are forwarded when you don t answer the call. Forward when unreached: Calls are forwarded when your phone is off, in airplane mode, or has no signal. Enter the phone number to which you would like to forward the calls. Tap Enable or OK

Launch the Settings app Tap the Phone option menu. Tap the Call Forwarding option menu. Enable the Call Forwarding switch. Tap the Forward To option menu. Enter the phone number to which you would like to forward the calls.
